We are the

ABOUT US

Welcome to the heart of student advocacy and empowerment at Ajayi Crowther University. The Student Representative Body (SRB) is a dedicated team of elected student leaders committed to amplifying the voices, interests, and concerns of the diverse student body.

As elected representatives, we serve as a vital link between students, faculty, and administration. We actively engage with our peers to understand their perspectives, gather feedback, and champion their interests across various facets of university life.

PAST ACUSA EXECUTIVES

ACUSA has a rich history shaped by the dedication and leadership of its past executives. Over the years, these individuals have played pivotal roles in fostering a vibrant and inclusive campus community, advocating for student interests, and implementing initiatives that enhance the overall university experience.
